author: Christopher Dengsø
content:
If you're looking to get started with DJ'ing, using your existing Spotify library might be the easiest way to begin.

Best Spotify DJ Software

  1. 1. djay Pro
  2. 2. Virtual dj

Here are the top 5 best apps and software for DJing with Spotify:

excerpt: DJing on mobile iOS devices will probably not match a full-blown setup for a long time, but that doesn't make it any less fun. Besides, you never know if you find yourself at a spontaneous party without your physical decks - use these apps to keep the party going anytime, anywhere.

title: 516 Best Wedding Songs of All Time [2021]
excerpt: Looking for the best wedding party music? Look no further! We've curated the ultimate playlist for your wedding with everything from timeless classics to the newest pop hits that'll make your guests wonder where their voices went by the end of the night.
author: Cueup DJ Booking
content:
Looking for the best wedding party music? Look no further! We've curated the ultimate playlist for your wedding with everything from timeless classics to the newest pop hits that'll make your guests wonder where their voices went by the end of the night.

In this post, you'll find something for every event. No matter if you're composing the playlist or working with a DJ, these are some of the particular songs that make an unforgettable party.

  • Girls Just Want to Have Fun - Cyndi Lauper

  • Bug A Boo (Borneland remix) - Destiny's Child

  • Talk Dirty - Jason Derulo

  • I'm Kissing You - Des'ree

  • From the Ground Up - Dan + Shay

  • We Say Yes - Marty Haugen

  • The Way I Am - Ingrid Michaelson

  • Firework - Katy Perry

  • Calabria 2008 - Natasja

  • Always Be My Baby - Mariah Carey
